primary.name: Light of Elune
primary.description: Heal target ally for 270 Health. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of this Ability by 2 seconds.

primary.name: Sentinel
primary.description:
Send an Owl that travels across the battleground revealing its path. Deals 173 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and reveals them for 5 seconds.
Every 8 Heroes hit by Sentinel decrease its Mana cost by 10 and cause it to pierce an additional target.

primary.name: Lunar Flare
primary.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 205 damage and Stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

primary.name: Shadowstalk
primary.description: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.

primary.name: Starfall
primary.description: Deal 91 damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

primary.name: Hunter's Mark
primary.description: Reveal a target enemy and lower their Armor by 25 for 4 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%. Cannot be used on Structures.

1.name: Ranger
1.description: Sentinel deals more damage based on the distance traveled, up to 75%.
1.questDescription: Hitting enemy Heroes with Sentinel increases the maximum damage bonus by 3%.

1.name: Lunar Blaze
1.questDescription: Hitting Heroes with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 3%.
1.rewardDescription:
After hitting 10 Heroes, Lunar Flare no longer has a Mana cost.
After hitting 20 Heroes, increase the range of Lunar Flare by 40%.

1.name: Ranger's Mark
1.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second.
1.questDescription: Every 60 Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by 1 second.

4.name: Moonlit Arrows
4.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Celestial Attunement
4.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns from its target. When a Stun is removed this way, Light of Elune may be used for free within 3 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Celestial Attunement.

4.name: Kaldorei Resistance
4.description: Light of Elune grants the target 15 Spell Armor for 6 seconds. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

7.name: Huntress' Fury
7.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby Heroes and Mercenaries.

7.name: Darnassian Archery
7.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 5% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

7.name: Trueshot Aura
7.description: Passively grant 10% increased Attack Damage to nearby allied Heroes. Activate to double this bonus for 5 seconds.

10.name: Shadowstalk
10.description: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.

10.name: Starfall
10.description: Deal 91 damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.name: Quickening Blessing
13.description: Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Empower
13.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 4 seconds each time it hits a Hero.

13.name: Harsh Moonlight
13.description: Sentinel Slows the target by 30% and reduces their damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Overflowing Light
16.description: While Tyrande is above 60% Health, Light of Elune's healing is increased by 30%.

16.name: Mark of Mending
16.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 1.85% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 3.12% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Elune's Chosen
16.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 5 seconds.

20.name: Eyes of the Huntress
20.description: After casting Shadowstalk, reveal all enemy Heroes for 2 seconds.

20.name: Celestial Wrath
20.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes hit.

20.name: Shooting Star
20.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Every 10 Basic Attack against Heroes casts a free Lunar Flare at a random Hero near Tyrande's position.

20.name: Iceblade Arrows
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
